thread.title: Good value for money in SoHo
thread.title_full: Good value for money in SoHo - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jentet2016
title: Good value for money in SoHo
text:
This hotel offers a continental breakfast, the staff is kind and helpful,and especially: a good value for money.
This hotel offers a fitness room, free coffee/tea/hot chocolate 24/7, a bar, a meeting room and a drinks machine.
Room Tip: Location, breakfast See more room tips
